marklogic.body: Hi Ricquetta! Thanks so much for dropping by at my blog and for saying hi - I really appreciate it :) And yay for another Canadian Blogger! I haven't tried any of the surprise monthly subscription boxes but I love the packaging of your GlossyBox. That Daily Moisturizing Lotion is my HG body lotion! I'm you love it as well. I agree with you on the colour of Blush - it is such a pink colour that isn't flattering on most skin tones....but I guess you could mix some of it with Vaseline/lip balm as a lipgloss? Great review though!
